com.communote.server.persistence.hibernate

Interface HibernateDao<T extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the entity this dao is for.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NavigationItemDao, ResolvedTopicToTopicDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateDaoImpl, NavigationItemDaoImpl, ResolvedTopicToTopicDaoImpl

    public interface HibernateDao<T extends Serializable>
    Generic Interface for a Dao for general Hibernate support .
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

        Loads all entities.

      • load

        T load(Long id)
        Loads the requested entity.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the entity to load.
        Returns:
        The entity or null, if not existent.

        Creates a new entity within the database.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to create.
        Returns:
        The database entity.

      • create

        Collection<T> create(Collection<T> entities)
        Creates all given entities within the database.
        Parameters:
        entities - The entities to create.
        Returns:
        The entities connected with the database.
